Hints.Hint: Tip #1: Use the [ALT] key to rotate your camera.
Tip #2: Use the [P] key to enter 'Planning View'.
Tip #3: [Ctrl + Z] will Undo the last movement or rotation of an object.
Tip #4: [Ctrl + Y] will Redo the last movement or rotation of an object.
Tip #5: Lock walls using the [L] key. This prevents any accidental movement of walls as you navigate your design.
Tip #6: When placing a product, hold [TAB] to place multiple copies.
Tip #7: Hold [Shift] and drag to rotate a product before placing it.
